meanings.definition: The quality or state of being exaggerated.
meanings.sent1: Her story had an exaggeratedness that made it hard to believe.
meanings.sent2: The exaggeratedness of his gestures made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent3: The exaggeratedness of his excuse for being late was so silly.
meanings.sent4: The exaggeratedness of the fisherman's tale was as big as the ocean.
meanings.sent5: The exaggeratedness of the painting's colors made it stand out in the gallery.

meanings.sent1: His exaggeratedness in storytelling always entertained us.

meanings.sent3: The comedian's exaggeratedness in his performance was hilarious.
meanings.sent4: The exaggeratedness of her excuses was like a mountain of lies.
meanings.sent5: The exaggeratedness of his expressions made the play more enjoyable.
